About

I’m Sebastián Palma, a Software Developer aiming for knowing more about databases, functional programming and foreign languages.

If you find any typo or error, you can feel free to write me to [sebastianpalma at pm dot com]. Or to directly comment using the Github repository of this project.

Thanks.
